name: WrightSock ECO Run Tab Socks - Unisex
description:
An eco-friendly version of on of Wrightsock's best selling styles, the lightweight double-layer knit has a minimal feel that suits running or walking. The fabric dries fast, so it's a great option for travel too.Both layers are made of Repreve® polyester, nylon and Lycra.Repreve® polyester is made from plastic bottles retrieved from waterways.Stabilizer zone in arch keeps them in place.Mesh panel for airflow and cooler feet.

        Sustainability
